tool_description: Magento 2 currency and language switcher automatically changes the store's language and currency based upon the user's location. The extension detects every visitor's Geo location with the help of its MaxMind IP database and redirects them to a store view with their local language and currency.
name: Magento 2 Currency Language Switcher
title: Magento 2 Currency Language Switcher

api_list.description: Magento 2 currency and language switcher automatically changes the store's language and currency based upon the user's location.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://henryroger-magento-2-currency-language-switcher-v1.p.rapidapi.com/0"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "henryroger-magento-2-currency-language-switcher-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
